name: Ari Swap
description: Ari Swap Corp is a social blockchain NFT Marketplace built on the Celo Ecosystem, a net carbon zero blockchain. Our purpose is to bring social fun for social good and prosperity for all. We strive to bring communities together through art and entertainment while paving a path for creators to grow and succeed. Whether youâ€™re a first-timer or an expert in blockchain and cryptocurrencies, we are building an environment for you to excel. Moreover, we are always looking for social causes that align with our purpose. As an organization, we acknowledge that every step we take towards helping society contributes to a better world. NFT Marketplace launched to the public on November 18. You can now discover, collect, sell and create incredible NFTs with lower gas fees.
